mainText:
Steve Jobs was a great man. At the time of his death, neither him nor  
us know exactly how his company will affect us in the future. One  
thing is for sure though, and that is that Apple has changed the way  
we listen to music, socialize, and stay connected through the world  
while at home, in the car, or just any where out in this world. He  
will be deeply missed, and condolences are sent out to his family and  
friends. Rest In Peace, Steve.
author: Dylan
